title: No mastery token
body: I received an S- on Ahri, and I was wondering if I got a mastery token so I can reach Mastery level 6, but I never receieved one? This same problem happened with my Ezreal, but I didn't take the picture. I was just wondering if I am able to get the token? You can see that Ahri is level 5 on my profile.

replies.body: Zombiemaster is on point here!  Tokens are currently available in Summoner's Rift per our [champion mastery](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204211284-Champion-Mastery-Guide).  Best of luck and congrats on your progress so far!
Unfortunately, mastery tokens are only awarded for normal and ranked Summoner's Rift matches. You cannot earn them on ARAM, Twisted Treeline, or any of the rotating game modes.
Aw. Well thanks for the information.
